title: Is NCERT enough to get a 300+ in biology for NEET? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: NCERT alone is sufficient to score 320+ provided that you are well versed with each and every line , diagrams as well as the summary at the end of the chapter Apart for this you can practise from MTG Neet bio mcqs and previous 10 yrs papers
